Name: Saturn
Text: Ohoho, finally!!!! One who appreciates the majesty of one such as I!

Name: Saturn
Text: So many of the phillistines in this galaxy are sorely lacking in that regard. No respect!

Name: Saturn
Text: Tell me, mortal, how would you like an opportunity to display your deference and devotion to mineself?

Name: Saturn
Text: I daresay it would lend some meaning to your comparatively small and insignificant existence! Mhmhm!

Options.Text: Yeah I'm kind of a speck of tiny dust
I don't know if I like being spoken to like that
